title: Apfelkuchen (Apple Cake) Recipe
description: This German apfelkuchen dessert uses a yeasted dough but only needs 30 minutes to rise. It's a moist and subtly sweet cake, making it perfect for an afternoon treat.

About Us The Allrecipes Allstars How to Add a Recipe GET THE MAGAZINE Recipes Global Cuisines European German Apfelkuchen (Apple Cake) 4.8 (61) 49 Reviews 20 Photos I fell in love with apfelkuchen when I was in 6th grade. Our teacher let us order from a local German bakery and eat our treats in class once a month. These flavors bring back wonderful memories. Submitted by Adrienne Gardner Updated on February 6, 2025 Save Rate Print Share Close Add Photo 20 20 20 20 Prep Time: 20 mins Cook Time: 35 mins Additional Time: 30 mins Total Time: 1 hr 25 mins Servings: 12 Yield: 1 (9x13-inch) cake Jump to Nutrition Facts Cook Mode (Keep screen awake) Ingredients 1x 2x 4x Oops! Something went wrong. Our team is working on it. Original recipe (1X) yields 12 servings 2 ¼ cups sifted all-purpose flour 1 ⅛ cups warm milk ¼ cup white sugar 1 (.25 ounce) package active dry yeast 6 tablespoons butter, softened 1 tablespoon vanilla extract 1 pinch salt 3 large apples - peeled, cored, and sliced 1 cup white sugar ¾ cup sifted all-purpose flour 2 ounces candied lemon peel, chopped (Optional) ½ teaspoon ground cinnamon ¼ teaspoon ground nutmeg 1 pinch salt ½ cup butter Directions Gather all ingredients. Grease the bottom and sides of a 9x13-inch baking dish or a 9-inch springform pan. Allrecipes / Preethi Venkatram Beat 2 ¼ cups flour, milk, 1/4 cup sugar, yeast, 6 tablespoons butter, vanilla extract, and 1 pinch salt in a large bowl with an electric mixer on high until dough is smooth, about 5 minutes. Allrecipes / Preethi Venkatram Spread into baking dish and press dough up the sides. Press apple slices into dough. Allrecipes / Preethi Venkatram Mix 1 cup sugar, 3/4 cup flour, candied lemon peel, cinnamon, nutmeg, and 1 pinch salt in a bowl. Cut in 1/2 cup butter with a knife or pastry blender until mixture resembles coarse crumbs. Allrecipes / Preethi Venkatram Sprinkle over apples. Allow dough to rise for 30 minutes. Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C). Allrecipes / Preethi Venkatram Bake in preheated oven until cake is golden brown and apples are tender, about 35 minutes. Allrecipes / Preethi Venkatram I Made It Print 122 home cooks made it! Nutrition Facts (per serving) 370 Calories 14g Fat 57g Carbs 5g Protein Show Full Nutrition Label Hide Full Nutrition Label Nutrition Facts Servings Per Recipe 12 Calories 370 % Daily Value * Total Fat 14g 18% Saturated Fat 9g 45% Cholesterol 37mg 12% Sodium 136mg 6% Total Carbohydrate 57g 21% Dietary Fiber 3g 9% Total Sugars 30g Protein 5g 9% Vitamin C 3mg 3% Calcium 47mg 4% Iron 2mg 9% Potassium 160mg 3% * Percent Daily Values are based on a 2,000 calorie diet. Your daily values may be higher or lower depending on your calorie needs. ** Nutrient information is not available for all ingredients. Amount is based on available nutrient data. (-) Information is not currently available for this nutrient. If you are following a medically restrictive diet, please consult your doctor or registered dietitian before preparing this recipe for personal consumption. Add Your Photo Photos of Apfelkuchen (Apple Cake) 01 of 20 Photo by  Allrecipes / Preethi Venkatram 02 of 20 Photo by  Diana Gossett 01/07/2019 So good! My mom is german. I grew up in Germany until I was 7. My Mom had an apfelkuchen recipe I made when I was a teenager even using applesauce instead of apples sometimes. It was delicious but she either lost it or couldn't remember it so I thought I'd try this recipe. It's not like the one my Mom made but still delicious!!!! 03 of 20 Photo by  starvinstudent 11/19/2017 Very confused... how on earth did ppl manage to beat this sticky viscous dough on high speed for five minutes?? When I tried to use my electric mixer on this, it climbed the beaters like a murderous octopus. I ended up partly kneading it by hand, partly poking at it with a wooden spoon, then just throwing up my hands in despair and defeat after two minutes. That being said, finished product was still an ok texture and tasted fine. But how are people beating this dough? 04 of 20 Photo by  starvinstudent 11/19/2017 Very confused... how on earth did ppl manage to beat this sticky viscous dough on high speed for five minutes?? When I tried to use my electric mixer on this, it climbed the beaters like a murderous octopus. I ended up partly kneading it by hand, partly poking at it with a wooden spoon, then just throwing up my hands in despair and defeat after two minutes. That being said, finished product was still an ok texture and tasted fine. But how are people beating this dough? 05 of 20 Photo by  starvinstudent 11/19/2017 Very confused... how on earth did ppl manage to beat this sticky viscous dough on high speed for five minutes?? When I tried to use my electric mixer on this, it climbed the beaters like a murderous octopus. I ended up partly kneading it by hand, partly poking at it with a wooden spoon, then just throwing up my hands in despair and defeat after two minutes. That being said, finished product was still an ok texture and tasted fine. But how are people beating this dough? 06 of 20 Photo by  Filipi 10/04/2016 07 of 20 Photo by  May Mamdoh 04/10/2016 08 of 20 Photo by  PLMLee 12/29/2015 I used dough hooks with a cake mixer to mix the dough, and a non-stick plastic spatula to push the dough into the pan, so handling the sticky dough was not a problem. Reduced sugar in the crumble topping, but added a spoonful of granular sugar over the topping after it was spread on top of the apples. I will be using more apples next time! 09 of 20 Photo by  Catherine Samuel 11/22/2015 10 of 20 Photo by  Tony Bush 08/23/2015 1 2 Next You’ll Also Love German Apple Cake 1,555 Ratings Polish Applesauce Cake 6 Ratings Apple Frangipane Cake 3 Ratings Easy Apple Charlotte 10 Ratings Versunkener Apfelkuchen (German Sunken Apple Cake) 6 Ratings Alsatian Apple Sheet Cake Irish Apple Cake Irish Apple Cake Cassava Flour-Apple Cake French Apple Cake 99 Ratings Moist German Sheet Pan Apple Cake Black Forest Cake II 183 Ratings Tarte Tatin 102 Ratings Russian Apple Tart Appeltaart (Dutch Apple Tart) 7 Ratings Caramel Apple Upside-Down Cake 5 Ratings Allrecipes Newsletters Follow Us Dinners Meals Ingredients Occasions Cuisines Kitchen Tips News Features About Us Editorial Process Privacy Policy Product Vetting Terms of Service Advertise Careers Contact Your Privacy Choices   Allrecipes is part of the Dotdash Meredith publishing family.
